user_instruction: 'Send an update to Mr. Griffin (charles.griffin@griffinandmurdock.com) about how things are going with my projects. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Project Status Update

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me a brief status update on each of the projects you’re currently handling? A short outline of recent progress, any blockers, and next steps would be ideal. Feel free to pull the latest details directly from your Notion pages to keep it concise.

Thanks for keeping me in the loop.

Best,  
Charles

final_output:
